thread.title: J&L Marketing Announces Ken Schaeffer as National Accounts Director

author: cnbc.com
title: J&L Marketing Announces Ken Schaeffer as National Accounts Director
text:
LOUISVILLE, Ky.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- J&L Marketing announced today that Ken Schaeffer has been named Director of National Accounts.
Ken Schaeffer is highly regarded within the automotive industry and has previously held Head of New Vehicle Sales and Regional VP positions at BMW of North America. Schaeffer will be servicing the BMW, MINI, Jaguar Land Rover and Volvo national accounts at J&L Marketing.
Schaeffer said, “I’m excited to be a part of the great team we have here at J&L and look forward to developing lasting profitable relationships.”
“We are extremely excited to have Ken join the J&L team! His experience & background will be highly beneficial as we work together with our OEM partners as well as moving forward in cultivating new industry relationships,” said Kirk Cave, Vice President of Sales at J&L Marketing.
For more information about the changes in leadership at J&L Marketing, contact Kirk Cave at KCave@jandlmarketing.com or 800.651.5508.
J&L MARKETING
J&L Marketing is a digital and direct marketing company based in Louisville, KY. The company has specialized in increasing traffic and conversions for the automotive industry since 1991. J&L Marketing has more than 200 employees and representatives throughout the United States. More information is available at www.jandlmarketing.com .
